name: DuckDuckGo Solarized Dark

user.name: Gen2
user.about:
Gen2 is a developer with an unhealthy obsession for breaking things, he is good at keeping things moving forward yet lacks the motivation to do anything himself.

Please note that I make alot of Solarized Dark themes, and in the screenshots certian elements such as the scrollbar, textboxes, and buttons will appear themed too, this is not part of the theme but in fact a KDE colour theme. If important parts of the theme are missing and do not appear as you believe they should from the screenshots, please contact me and I will try to resolve it.
